<script>
Graph.pauseAnimation();

/* stantard reusable script for persistent elements etc*/
const slidestem = "wireframe-slide-";
const d3outerContainer = document.getElementById('outercontainer');
const slideActions = {
    'wireframe-slide-0': () => {
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        Graph.cameraPosition(
            {x:0,y:-100,z:-1500}, // position
            {x:0,y:-100,z:0},  //look at
            0 //duration
        );
        repositionNodes("json/human.json",0);
    },
    'wireframe-slide-5': () => {
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        Graph.cameraPosition(
            {x:-224,y:203,z:-5}, // position
            {x:-224,y:203,z:1500}, // look at this point
            3000 //duration
            );
        setTimeout(() => {
            repositionNodes("json/cells.json");
        }, 2400); // delay 
    },
    'wireframe-slide-6': () => {
        // inside view of cells
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        Graph.cameraPosition(
            {x:0,y:-600,z:4500},
            {x:0,y:500,z:5000},
            9000)
    },
    'wireframe-slide-7': () => {
        // 0 = pathways
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        dataSets[0](Graph);
    },
    'wireframe-slide-8': () => {
        //1 = pathways-DNA view
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        dataSets[1](Graph);
    },
    'wireframe-slide-9a': () => {
        Graph.pauseAnimation();
        // intentionally empty
    },
    'wireframe-slide-9b': () => {
        // blank reset slide to ensure correct camera position for tyk2
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        Graph.graphData({ nodes: [], links: [] });
        Graph.cameraPosition(
            {x:0,y:0,z:0},
            {x:0,y:0,z:5000},
            0);
    },
    'wireframe-slide-10': () => {
        //2 = tyk2
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        dataSets[2](Graph);
    },
    'wireframe-slide-11': () => {
        //3 = tyk2 pictures
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        dataSets[3](Graph);
    },
    'wireframe-slide-12': () => {
        //4 = tyk2 7 nodes
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        dataSets[4](Graph);
    },
    'wireframe-slide-14': () => {
        //5 = human again
        resetGraph(Graph);
        dataSets[5](Graph);
        // zoom back out 
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        Graph.cameraPosition(
            {x:0,y:-100,z:-1500}, // position
            {x:0,y:-100,z:0},  //look at
            4000 //duration
        );
    },
    'wireframe-slide-16': () => {
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        repositionNodes("json/chicken.json");
    },
    'wireframe-slide-17': () => {
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        repositionNodes("json/crop.json");
    },
    'wireframe-slide-18': () => {
        Graph.resumeAnimation();
        repositionNodes("json/virus.json");
    },
    'wireframe-slide-19': () => {
        resetGraph(Graph);
        Graph.pauseAnimation();
    }
};
</script>
